Please take a look at the notes below:
Make sure that the cells containing dates are actually date cells and not just numbers or text
For the currency code please use the ISO 4217 active codes available at
The financial information (commitment, amounts extended, etc.) must be inputed in full amounts and with no thousand separators
Please make sure you don't import the same data twice otherwise the information will be duplicated in the system
Please note that all the transactions imported will be saved as 'approved'. This means it will affect all reports and exports
The file size should not be higher than 15 Megabytes. If it is, please split it into several files
